1  FY20 covers our impacts from February 1, 2019, to January 31, 2020.
3 Survey data captures overall employee sentiment towards Splunk as of March 31, 2019 for 85% of our employees (3,777 responses). Questions asked include: Splunk motivates me  
to go beyond what I would in a similar role elsewhere and I am proud to work for Splunk.
